verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> Then came כָּל־ <WH3605> all שִׁבְטֵ֧י <WH7626> all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> to David חֶבְר֑וֹנָה <WH2275> unto Hebron וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and spake לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying הִנְנ֛וּ <WH2005> behold עַצְמְךָ֥ <WH6106> Behold we [are] thy bone וּֽבְשָׂרְךָ֖ <WH1320> and thy flesh אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <WH587> ourselves

גַּם־ <WH1571> again אֶתְמ֣וֹל <WH865> before time גַּם־ <WH1571> again שִׁלְשׁ֗וֹם <WH8032> before that time בִּהְי֨וֹת <WH1961> become שָׁא֥וּל <WH7586> when Saul מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> was king עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> over אַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you [הָיִיתָה כ] (הָיִ֛יתָ <WH1961> become ק) [מֹוצִיא כ] (הַמֹּוצִ֥יא <WH3318> after ק) [וְהַמֵּבִי כ] (וְהַמֵּבִ֖יא <WH935> abide ק) אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> and the LORD לְךָ֗ אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> You תִרְעֶ֤ה <WH7462> to thee Thou shalt feed אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> my people אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וְאַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you תִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> will be a לְנָגִ֖יד <WH5057> and thou shalt be a captain עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> over Israel

וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <WH935> came כָּל־ <WH3605> all זִקְנֵ֨י <WH2205> So all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> to the king חֶבְר֔וֹנָה <WH2275> to Hebron וַיִּכְרֹ֣ת <WH3772> made לָהֶם֩ הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> and king דָּוִ֥ד <WH1732> David בְּרִ֛ית <WH1285> a league בְּחֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> with them in Hebron לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיִּמְשְׁח֧וּ <WH4886> and they anointed אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> David לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> king עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> over Israel פ

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> [was] thirty שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> years דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> David בְּמָלְכ֑וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years מָלָֽךְ׃ <WH4427> [and] he reigned

בְּחֶבְרוֹן֙ <WH2275> In Hebron מָלַ֣ךְ <WH4427> he reigned עַל־ <WH5921> over יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> over Judah שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> seven שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years וְשִׁשָּׁ֣ה <WH8337> and six חֳדָשִׁ֑ים <WH2320> months וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <WH3389> and in Jerusalem מָלַ֗ךְ <WH4427> he reigned שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <WH7970> thirty וְשָׁלֹשׁ֙ <WH7969> and three שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years עַ֥ל <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> over all Israel וִיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> and Judah

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> went הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king וַֽאֲנָשָׁיו֙ <WH376> and his men יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem אֶל־ <WH413> against הַיְבֻסִ֖י <WH2983> unto the Jebusites יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> the inhabitants הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> which spake לְדָוִ֤ד <WH1732> unto David לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> saying לֹא־ <WH3808> cannot תָב֣וֹא <WH935> thou shalt not come in הֵ֔נָּה <WH2008> here כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo הֱסִֽירְךָ֗ <WH5493> Except thou take away הַעִוְרִ֤ים <WH5787> the blind וְהַפִּסְחִים֙ <WH6452> halt לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> hither thinking לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot יָב֥וֹא <WH935> cannot come in דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> David הֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2008> here

וַיִּלְכֹּ֣ד <WH3920> took דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> Nevertheless David אֵ֖ת <WH853> מְצֻדַ֣ת <WH4686> the strong hold צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> of Zion הִ֖יא <WH1931> that עִ֥יר <WH5892> the same [is] the city דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> And David בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> on that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he כָּל־ <WH3605> Whoever מַכֵּ֤ה <WH5221> and smiteth יְבֻסִי֙ <WH2983> the Jebusites וְיִגַּ֣ע <WH5060> Whosoever getteth up בַּצִּנּ֔וֹר <WH6794> to the gutter וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַפִּסְחִים֙ <WH6455> and the lame וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַ֣עִוְרִ֔ים <WH5787> and the blind [שְׂנֹאו כ] (שְׂנֻאֵ֖י <WH8130> enemy ק) נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> soul דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David's עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <WH559> [he shall be chief and captain] Wherefore they said עִוֵּ֣ר <WH5787> The blind וּפִסֵּ֔חַ <WH6455> and the lame לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יָב֖וֹא <WH935> shall not come אֶל־ <WH413> into הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> into the house

וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <WH3427> dwelt דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> So David בַּמְּצֻדָ֔ה <WH4686> in the fort וַיִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> and called לָ֖הּ עִ֣יר <WH5892> it the city דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David וַיִּ֤בֶן <WH1129> built דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> round about מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמִּלּ֖וֹא <WH4407> from Millo וָבָֽיְתָה׃ <WH1004> and inward

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> on דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> And David הָל֣וֹךְ <WH1980> greater וְגָד֑וֹל <WH1419> and grew great וַיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with פ

וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <WH7971> sent חִירָ֨ם <WH2438> And Hiram מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king צֹ֥ר <WH6865> of Tyre מַלְאָכִים֮ <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִד֒ <WH1732> to David וַעֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> trees אֲרָזִ֔ים <WH730> and cedar וְחָרָשֵׁ֣י <WH2796> and carpenters עֵ֔ץ <WH6086> trees וְחָֽרָשֵׁ֖י <WH2796> artificer אֶ֣בֶן <WH68> stones קִ֑יר <WH7023> mason וַיִּבְנֽוּ־ <WH1129> and they built בַ֖יִת <WH1004> an house לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> David

וַיֵּ֣דַע <WH3045> perceived דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הֱכִינ֧וֹ <WH3559> had established יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> that the LORD לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> him king עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> over Israel וְכִי֙ <WH3588> for נִשֵּׂ֣א <WH5375> and that he had exalted מַמְלַכְתּ֔וֹ <WH4467> his kingdom בַּעֲב֖וּר <WH5668> the sake עַמּ֥וֹ <WH5971> for his people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel's ס

וַיִּקַּח֩ <WH3947> took דָּוִ֨ד <WH1732> And David ע֜וֹד <WH5750> more פִּֽלַגְשִׁ֤ים <WH6370> [him] more concubines וְנָשִׁים֙ <WH802> and wives מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> out of Jerusalem אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after בֹּא֣וֹ <WH935> he was come מֵחֶבְר֑וֹן <WH2275> from Hebron וַיִּוָּ֥לְדוּ <WH3205> born ע֛וֹד <WH5750> and more לְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> to David בָּנִ֥ים <WH1121> and there were yet sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> and daughters

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> now these שְׁמ֛וֹת <WH8034> And these [be] the names הַיִּלֹּדִ֥ים <WH3209> of those that were born ל֖וֹ בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> unto him in Jerusalem שַׁמּ֣וּעַ <WH8051> Shammua וְשׁוֹבָ֔ב <WH7727> and Shobab וְנָתָ֖ן <WH5416> and Nathan וּשְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> and Solomon
וְיִבְחָ֥ר <WH2984> Ibhar וֶאֱלִישׁ֖וּעַ <WH474> also and Elishua וְנֶ֥פֶג <WH5298> and Nepheg וְיָפִֽיעַ׃ <WH3309> and Japhia
וֶאֱלִישָׁמָ֥ע <WH476> And Elishama וְאֶלְיָדָ֖ע <WH450> and Eliada וֶאֱלִיפָֽלֶט׃ <WH467> and Eliphalet פ

וַיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> heard פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> But when the Philistines כִּי־ <WH3588> for מָשְׁח֨וּ <WH4886> that they had anointed אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> David לְמֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> king עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> over Israel וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> came up כָל־ <WH3605> all פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> all the Philistines לְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <WH1245> to seek אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> David וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> and David וַיֵּ֖רֶד <WH3381> [of it] and went down אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמְּצוּדָֽה׃ <WH4686> to the hold
וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> The Philistines בָּ֑אוּ <WH935> also came וַיִּנָּטְשׁ֖וּ <WH5203> and spread בְּעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> themselves in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <WH7497> of Rephaim

וַיִּשְׁאַ֨ל <WH7592> enquired דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> And David בַּֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying הַאֶֽעֱלֶה֙ <WH5927> Shall I go up אֶל־ <WH413> against פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> the Philistines הֲתִתְּנֵ֖ם <WH5414> for I will doubtless בְּיָדִ֑י <WH3027> into thine hand וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> against דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> unto David עֲלֵ֔ה <WH5927> Go up כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָתֹ֥ן <WH5414> deliver אֶתֵּ֛ן <WH5414> will certainly אֶת־ <WH853> הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> the Philistines בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> your hand

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> came דָוִ֥ד <WH1732> And David בְּבַֽעַל־ פְּרָצִים֮ <WH1188> to Baalperazim וַיַּכֵּ֣ם <WH5221> smote שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there דָּוִד֒ <WH1732> and David וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> them there and said פָּרַ֨ץ <WH6555> hath broken forth יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> אֹיְבַ֛י <WH341> upon mine enemies לְפָנַ֖י <WH6440> before כְּפֶ֣רֶץ <WH6556> me as the breach מָ֑יִם <WH4325> of waters עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that קָרָ֛א <WH7121> Therefore he called שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> of that place הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he בַּ֥עַל פְּרָצִֽים׃ <WH1188> Baalperazim

וַיַּעַזְבוּ־ <WH5800> And there they left שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> עֲצַבֵּיהֶ֑ם <WH6091> their images וַיִּשָּׂאֵ֥ם <WH5375> burned דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> and David וַאֲנָשָֽׁיו׃ <WH582> and his men פ

וַיֹּסִ֥פוּ <WH3254> yet again ע֛וֹד <WH5750> again פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> And the Philistines לַֽעֲל֑וֹת <WH5927> came up וַיִּנָּֽטְשׁ֖וּ <WH5203> and spread בְּעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> themselves in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <WH7497> of Rephaim

וַיִּשְׁאַ֤ל <WH7592> enquired דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And when David בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> he said לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תַעֲלֶ֑ה <WH5927> Thou shalt not go up הָסֵב֙ <WH5437> [but] fetch a compass אֶל־ <WH413> about אַ֣חֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH310> behind וּבָ֥אתָ <WH935> them and come לָהֶ֖ם מִמּ֥וּל <WH4136> upon them over against בְּכָאִֽים׃ <WH1057> the mulberry trees

וִ֠יהִי <WH1961> become [בְּשָׁמְעֲךָ כ] (כְּֽשָׁמְעֲךָ֞ <WH8085> listen ק) אֶת־ <WH853> ק֧וֹל <WH6963> the sound צְעָדָ֛ה <WH6807> of a going בְּרָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> in the tops הַבְּכָאִ֖ים <WH1057> of the mulberry trees אָ֣ז <WH227> then תֶּחֱרָ֑ץ <WH2782> that then thou shalt bestir כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָ֗ז <WH227> then יָצָ֤א <WH3318> go out יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> thyself for then shall the LORD לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before לְהַכּ֖וֹת <WH5221> thee to smite בְּמַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> the host פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> of the Philistines

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> did so דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David כֵּ֔ן <WH3651> so כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֖הוּ <WH6680> had commanded יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> as the LORD וַיַּךְ֙ <WH5221> him and smote אֶת־ <WH853> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> the Philistines מִגֶּ֖בַע <WH1387> from Geba עַד־ <WH5704> far בֹּאֲךָ֥ <WH935> until thou come גָֽזֶר׃ <WH1507> to Gazer פ
